name: As Above So Below VR
description: As Above So Below VR, is an exciting underwater immersive game that lets you explore the depth of the ocean.  As an underwater explorer, the  player must take on  the mantle of facilitating the regeneration of life underwater.  Use the vacuum gun to clean as much sea trash as you can  and help endangered  fish species come back to life.  Time is running out— you must escape before the shark comes hunting for you.  So take a deep breath and dive into this adrenaline-filled challenge!
